name: IDOL v.0.1.5
description:
This demo is unpolished. you'll likely see missing animations and things of the sort.

Controls

this game is designed for a gamepad.

Gamepad

  • (A ) to jump/confirm
  • (B ) to grab
  • (X ) to shoot
  • RT to sprint
  • RS to roll left and right

Keyborad

  • Z to jump/confirm
  • C to grab
  • X to shoot
  • Shift to sprint
  • A/S to roll left and right

Extra moves

  • Down + Jump to stomp dive
  • Down + jump while on wall to downward wall jump
  • Jump while rolling to roll jump
  • Hold roll  to roll longer down a hill

Place holder music

Tutorial:  Conceptual Cubes by DavidOrr https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/309748

Hub: Garden Party by blarsa https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/199965

Other tracks are Backyard-band, Hillbilly breakout, BackBoneBreaks & Electroman Adventures by Water Flame https://waterflame.newgrounds.com/

Funiculì, Funiculà cover was done by me
